trans-unit.source: Provides information about a control that can be used by an accessibility application.
Windows Forms has accessibility support built in, and provides information about your application that enables it to work with accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Windows Forms tem suporte de acessibilidade interno e fornece informações sobre o aplicativo que permite trabalhar com aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: Examples of accessibility client applications are: screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities.
trans-unit.target: São exemplos de aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade: tela ampliador e utilitários de revisor, utilitários de entrada de voz, na tela teclados, dispositivos de entrada alternativos e os utilitários de aprimoramento de teclado.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you will want to provide additional information to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Às vezes, você deve fornecer informações adicionais para aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways of providing this additional information.
trans-unit.target: Há duas maneiras de fornecer essas informações adicionais.

trans-unit.source: To provide limited accessibility information for existing controls, set the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Para fornecer informações de acessibilidade limitada para controles existentes, defina o controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> valores de propriedade, que serão relatados para aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you require more accessibility information to be included with your control, you can write your own class deriving from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> classes.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, se você precisar de mais informações sobre acessibilidade para ser incluído no seu controle, você pode escrever sua própria classe derivando de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> classes.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are writing your own control that is not derived from the common controls or you require such operations as hit testing within your control, you should create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> for your control by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você estiver escrevendo seu próprio controle que não é derivado de controles comuns ou requerem operações como teste de clique dentro do controle, você deve criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> para seu controle chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: If you override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.GetChild%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, you must also override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.GetChildCount%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Se você substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.GetChild%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método, você também deve substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.GetChildCount%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Para obter ou definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> propriedade, você deve adicionar uma referência para o `Accessibility` assembly instalado com o .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For more information about accessible objects, see the Active Accessibility section of the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre objetos acessíveis, consulte a seção de acessibilidade ativa da biblioteca MSDN.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a check box control that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> class and creates a custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> for the derived class to use.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um controle de caixa de seleção que deriva de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> classe e cria um personalizado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> para a classe derivada usar.

trans-unit.source: The derived class, `MyCheckBox`, has an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance.Button> by default so it appears as a toggle button.
trans-unit.target: A classe derivada, `MyCheckBox`, tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance.Button> por padrão, então ele aparece como um botão de alternância.

trans-unit.source: The derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> class, `MyCheckBoxControlAccessibleObject`, overrides three properties to account for the difference in appearance.
trans-unit.target: Derivada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> classe `MyCheckBoxControlAccessibleObject`, substitui três propriedades para considerar a diferença de aparência.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> that owns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject" /> class.

The following code example creates a check box control that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> class and creates a custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> for the derived class to use.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um controle de caixa de seleção que deriva de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> classe e cria um personalizado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> para a classe derivada usar.

trans-unit.source: The derived class, `MyCheckBox`, has an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance.Button> by default so it appears as a toggle button.
trans-unit.target: A classe derivada, `MyCheckBox`, tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance.Button> por padrão, então ele aparece como um botão de alternância.

trans-unit.source: The derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> class, `MyCheckBoxControlAccessibleObject`, overrides three properties to account for the difference in appearance.
trans-unit.target: Derivada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> classe `MyCheckBoxControlAccessibleObject`, substitui três propriedades para considerar a diferença de aparência.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="ownerControl" /> parameter value is <see langword="null" />.
Gets a string that describes the default action of the object.
Not all objects have a default action.
A description of the default action for an object, or <see langword="null" /> if this object has no default action.
trans-unit.target: Uma descrição da ação padrão para um objeto, ou <see langword="null" /> se este objeto não tem nenhuma ação padrão.

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject" />.
A string describing the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que descreve o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a string that represents the path to the Help file associated with this accessible object.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Gets an identifier for a Help topic and the path to the Help file associated with this accessible object.
An identifier for a Help topic, or -1 if there is no Help topic.

On return, the <paramref name="fileName" /> parameter will contain the path to the Help file associated with this accessible object, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no <see langword="IAccessible" /> interface specified.
Pass the identifier to the WinHelp file specified by the `fileName` parameter to identify the desired Help topic.
trans-unit.target: Passe o identificador para o arquivo WinHelp especificado pelo `fileName` parâmetro para identificar o tópico da Ajuda desejado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the handle of the accessible object.
An <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> that represents the handle of the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> que representa o identificador do controle.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.Handle%2A> property for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> is equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> it is associated with.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.Handle%2A> propriedade para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> é igual ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> está associado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of what the object does or how the object is used.
The description of what the object does or how the object is used.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do que o objeto não ou como o objeto é usado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object shortcut key or access key for an accessible object.
The object shortcut key or access key for an accessible object, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no shortcut key associated with the object.
trans-unit.target: A tecla de atalho do objeto ou a chave de acesso para um objeto acessível, ou <see langword="null" /> se não houver nenhuma tecla de atalho associada ao objeto.

trans-unit.source: All objects that have a shortcut key or access key should support this property.
trans-unit.target: Todos os objetos que têm uma tecla de atalho ou tecla de acesso devem dar suporte a essa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the accessible object name.
The accessible object name.
trans-unit.target: O nome do objeto acessível.

trans-unit.source: Notifies accessibility client applications of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents" /> to notify the accessibility client applications of.
Notifies accessibility client applications of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents" />.

You must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A> method for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> object the accessibility client applications are to be notified of.
trans-unit.target: Você deve chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A> método para cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> serão notificados de aplicativos de cliente de acessibilidade do objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A> method is typically called when a property is set or from within an event handler.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A> método normalmente é chamado quando uma propriedade é definida ou de dentro um manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A> method and pass in an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> value of `Hide` from within the event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A> método e passar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> valor `Hide` de dentro do manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents" /> to notify the accessibility client applications of.
The child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to notify of the accessible event.
Notifies the accessibility client applications of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents" /> for the specified child control.

You must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A> method for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> object the accessibility client applications are to be notified of.
trans-unit.target: Você deve chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A> método para cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> serão notificados de aplicativos de cliente de acessibilidade do objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A> method is typically called when a property is set or from within an event handler.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A> método normalmente é chamado quando uma propriedade é definida ou de dentro um manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A> method and pass in an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> value of `Hide` from within from within the event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A> método e passar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> valor `Hide` de dentro de dentro do manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents" /> to notify the accessibility client applications of.
The identifier of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />.
The child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to notify of the accessible event.

Notifies the accessibility client applications of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents" /> for the specified child control, giving the identification of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />.
Gets the owner of the accessible object.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> that owns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> que tem o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a check box control that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> class and creates a custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> for the derived class to use.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um controle de caixa de seleção que deriva de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> classe e cria um personalizado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> para a classe derivada usar.

trans-unit.source: The derived class, `MyCheckBox`, has an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance.Button> by default so it appears as a toggle button.
trans-unit.target: A classe derivada, `MyCheckBox`, tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance.Button> por padrão, então ele aparece como um botão de alternância.

trans-unit.source: The derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> class, `MyCheckBoxControlAccessibleObject`, overrides three properties to account for the difference in appearance.
trans-unit.target: Derivada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> classe `MyCheckBoxControlAccessibleObject`, substitui três propriedades para considerar a diferença de aparência.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent of an accessible object.
An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that represents the parent of an accessible object, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no parent object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> que representa o pai de um objeto acessível, ou <see langword="null" /> se não houver nenhum objeto pai.

trans-unit.source: Gets the role of this accessible object.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current object.
A string that represents the current object.
